text: Red Clover (Trifolium pratense) is a species of plant. It is native to Europe, Africa, and Asia. It has been introduced to North America, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico. It blooms from spring to early fall. It is found in fields, pastures, and near roadsides. Red Clover likes to grow in thick, dry soil. ==Other websites== *Trifolium pratense at USDA PLANTS Database *Trifolium pratense at Germplasm Resources Information Network *Trifolium pratense at Kansas Wildflowers and Grasses Category:Faboideae
title: Trifolium pratense
